name: Motto Me de Unou o Kitaeru DS: Sokudoku Jutsu
name_original: Motto Me de Unou o Kitaeru DS: Sokudoku Jutsu
description:
Motto Me de Unou o Kitaeru DS: Sokudoku Jutsu is an educational game developed by Milestone. It came out on 31-07-2008. It was published by Nintendo.
Motto Me de Unou o Kitaeru DS: Sokudoku Jutsu is available on Nintendo DS.
